: :Hot Rod: :

Hot Rod decided to call for help. He turned on his comlink, again.
"To all Maximals who hear this. This is Hot Rod. The Cybertronian Fire
is still under attack. The Predicons Tankorr, Rampage, Scourge and some
others are attacking. The one known as DeathScyth, is also somewhere in
the area. We need enforcements, at the Cybertronian Fire."
